item.title: Centos7 安装 Postgresql
item.description: 安装 1$ yum install https://download.postgresql.org/pub/repos/yum/10/redhat/rhel-7-x86_64/pgdg-centos10-10-2.noarch.rpm 2 3# 安装服务端包 4$ yum install postgresql10-server postgresql10 配置 1# 初始化数据库，设置自启动 2$ /usr/pgsql-10/bin/postgresql-10-setup initdb 3$ systemctl enable postgresql-10 4$ systemctl start postgresql-10 5 6# 设置防火墙规则 7$ iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 5432 -j ACCEPT #开放P
